page.title: 10 Face Lift for North Hull
page.content: The dullness resulting from sameness is udergoing change. Two years ago a drive through the North Hull Estate was simply a through journey. Nothing stood out to catch the eye. Nowadays, every morning around half nine, the pavements are filled by hoards of young men on their way to or from temporary canteens. A welcome break from the smashing down, concreting in and hammering up as new fences replace the old. Roofes are retiled on mass and varying colour washes replace the dirty grey of half a century of weathered pebble-dash. Other and growing variations are stone cladding, double glazing and storm porching, noticeable by their comparative rarity. A growing band of{house owners on this council estate are the only ones who can or will make such high cost improvements to their properties.
